data.name: A Bad Game Of Football
data.detailed_description:
A Bad Game Of Football is the unlikely combo of two genres: Real Time Strategy and Football. We like to call it Real Time Soccer! Here's what it is:

It's all on you!

You are in charge of your whole team, in real time! Where they are, what they do, if they start picking their noses, who or what they kick - You control it all! No more blaming the AI when you loose, now you can rest easy knowing you just suck.

The world's most unrealistic football simulator

If you want decent football, there are plenty of options out there. We decided to spice it up: With explosions, item pick-ups, tackles that properly hurt your opponent, a referee that actually gives fouling players what they deserve (hint: bring a mop and bucket to clean up the mess) and arenas so dangerous these matches can only be set in places with a total disregard for human rights. The stage is set for a a really, really bad game of football.

‚ÄúWhen we explode, we all look the same‚Äù

All player units are the same. No leveling of stats, no pay to win advantage over other players, and no grinding for special characters. Every player unit, no matter their appearance, is just as functional (and expendable) as any other. True equality has finally been achieved! You're welcome, world! Of course, that doesn't mean they can't go out in style: You get to pick their uniforms, hats and colors!

What to expect:


In the Demo:
  • The baddest physics-based Football RTS demo, ever.
  • One (1) playable arena (very generous of us, yes)
  • Play online against a friend. (If you don't have any, find one in our Discord).
  • An offline training mode where you can try out the controls.


In the Full game:
  • The baddest physics-based Football RTS game, ever.
  • Lots of unique arenas, each with their own twist!
  • A roster of special Trainers, each with their own unique ability (finally you get to call in an airstrike during a soccer match)
  • Team customizer. Make your local team, your favorite big FC or just go for something really weird.
  • Frequent content updates: New arenas, uniforms, boss fights...
  • Matchmaking, duh! No better guarantee of bad times than battling strangers on the internet.
  • Cup mode. Have more than one friend? Well, well, look at mister sociable over here! Luckily the final version of the game will feature cups supporting up to 16 teams. May the best Real Time Soccer player win!
